promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic ibex grass-type pokemon wearing golden gemstones. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemprongle, a a chibi young basic ibex grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Spiral Drain. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "grass" or "Gemprongle". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, ibex-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This petite mountain dweller flourishes in woodsy habitats. With Spiral Drain, it charmingly leeches energy from surrounding flora.
